name: Hoop Boy
description:
Hoop Boy,
Tap to Bounce your way across platforms while timing your bounce at the right time to go through Hoops.
Bounce , Up and down through Hoops, earning you points.
Unlock Four Levels by going 100% In Distance through each Level.
The Fourth Level is a random endless challenge, where you challenge for the top of the Leader board.
More Hoops more Points.

Features-
-One tap gameplay
-GameCentre Leaderboards to challenge friend
-Four Levels to Un Lock, (More Coming Soon)
-Hard challenging game.

Music (and Sound Effects) by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
